abstract.para: The topic covers &selnx; development and administration packages.

topic.para: &productnameshort; &productnumber; provides you with tools to manage &selnx; on your system.
The policycoreutils package contains the basic tools needed for &selnx; administration and is installed by default. It contains sestatus, restorecon, semodule, setsebool and many other tools.
Additionally, the policycoreutils-python-utils package can be installed, which provides helper tools that make &selnx; administration easier. This includes tools such as audit2allow and semanage:
